title: How to Make Popcorn Ice Cream

steps.headline: Get a packet of your favorite popcorn and set it aside.
steps.description: In a saucepan, mix two cups of cream and one cup of milk and add the popcorn.

steps.headline: Boil the milk and cream mixture and let it stand in the saucepan for 10 - 15 minutes.
steps.description: This allows the milk and cream to absorb the popcorn flavour.

steps.headline: Drain the mixture with a colander and into a bowl.
steps.description: Strain out and discard remaining pieces of popcorn.

steps.headline: Combine five egg yolks with a cup of sugar in a separate bowl and mix until fluffy.
steps.description: Beat the egg and sugar combination with the cream and milk mixture.

steps.headline: Reheat the saucepan on the stove until the mixture reaches 100 F degrees or until it becomes thick.
steps.description: Stir constantly to keep ingredients from boiling.

steps.headline: Scoop the mixture into a container and cool the mixture in a freezer.
steps.description: Freeze for at least 2 hours to ensure firmness.

steps.headline: Use food colouring and/or syrup if you want to enhance different colours.
steps.description: You can also use this to enhance flavour.

text: Get a packet of your favorite popcorn and set it aside. In a saucepan, mix two cups of cream and one cup of milk and add the popcorn. Boil the milk and cream mixture and let it stand in the saucepan for 10 - 15 minutes. This allows the milk and cream to absorb the popcorn flavour. Drain the mixture with a colander and into a bowl. Strain out and discard remaining pieces of popcorn. Combine five egg yolks with a cup of sugar in a separate bowl and mix until fluffy. Beat the egg and sugar combination with the cream and milk mixture. Reheat the saucepan on the stove until the mixture reaches 100 F degrees or until it becomes thick. Stir constantly to keep ingredients from boiling. Scoop the mixture into a container and cool the mixture in a freezer. Freeze for at least 2 hours to ensure firmness. Use food colouring and/or syrup if you want to enhance different colours. You can also use this to enhance flavour. Finished.
